bibl.title: Digital Papyrology II. Case Studies on the Digital Edition of Ancient Greek Papyri
bibl.seg: Nicola Reggiani (ed.), Digital Papyrology II. Case Studies on the Digital Edition of Ancient Greek Papyri.
Berlin - Boston, de Gruyter, 2018, viii-190 pp. ISBN 978-3-11-053852-6. €89,95.

C.R. par Thomas J. Kraus, TC: A Journal of Biblical Textual Criticism 23 (2018) 6 pp. < http://rosetta.reltech.org/TC/v23/TC-2018-Rev-Reggiani-Kraus.pdf > [concerne également: Nicola Reggiani, Digital Papyrology I. Methods, Tools and Trends (Berlin - Boston, 2017)].
